Articles.Content: I present to you the Kronus Super-Heavy Lifter. This craft can get the entire second stage, with 21 tanks worth of mass to Minmus orbit, with an 8-tank lander / Kerbin return craft perched atop. You may need a powerful computer for the initial stage, and any suggestions on how to reduce the lag would be greatly appreciated.
Nice one, but I have only 1 fps during the flight.
Can you do a tripleshot with it? IE, Mun -> Minmus -> Mun?
